job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Job DescriptionMachine Learning Engineer in Atlanta, GA 30092Interview LogisticsVideoRequired Skills SetYears of Experience: 5+ yearsEducation Required: Bachelors Degree or equivalent work experienceMachine LearningThe position will require the candidate has experience with Machine Learning strategy, data preparation, visualization, splitting, modeling, and model deployments.SQLWriting efficient queries sourced from restful internal/external APIs, MS SQL Servers, Oracle, and Teradata sources.PythonData analysisMSSQL ServerETL Skills, SSISC#Nice To Have SkillsAdditional Preferred Skills:Min.ioTableauMulti-Platform Machine Learning (Microsoft Azure, Google AI, open-source Client platforms)C# Machine Learning Libraries experience (Client.net, and extensions)C# MVCJavaMicrosoft PowershellEssBase AutomationProject DescriptionWe are looking for a Machine Learning (Client) Engineer to help us create business intelligence products that support financial and technical objectives. Machine Learning Engineer responsibilities include staging and cleaning data, developing machine learning models, maintaining Client systems, and occasionally presenting findings to executives. To do this job successfully, you need exceptional skills in statistics and programming. This team member will be working with subject matter experts in Accounting, Marketing, Engineering, and Finance.Physical Environment And Working ConditionsRemote until covid restrictions are lifted.
